plot: Glazed is the story of listless veteran, Bill Malone. The beleaguered vet sits in the dark chain smoking cigarettes, and begins to recount the events of one terrible day he can never forget...
title: Glazed
plot_es: Glazed is the story of listless veteran, Bill Malone. The beleaguered vet sits in the dark chain smoking cigarettes, and begins to recount the events of one terrible day he can never forget...
